references.paper_title: High-resolution daytime translation without domain labels
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant due to its focus on high-resolution image translation, a key aspect of the current work.

references.paper_title: Compositional GAN: learning image-conditional binary composition
references.reason: This paper is important as it relates to the task of image composition, which is the broader area of research that image harmonization falls under.

references.paper_title: Toward realistic image compositing with adversarial learning
references.reason: This paper is significant because it introduces the concept of adversarial learning for image compositing, a technique that has influenced many subsequent works in this area, including the current one.

references.paper_title: Photographic image synthesis with cascaded refinement networks
references.reason: This paper is relevant as it deals with image synthesis and refinement, which are related sub-problems within image processing and generation.
This is a foundational paper in color harmonization and has inspired many newer methods that use more modern techniques such as deep learning.
